com.smarthome.simulator.modules

Class SHP

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smarthome.simulator.modules.Module
      • com.smarthome.simulator.modules.SHP

  • public class SHP
extends Module
    The SHP class represents the Smart Home Security module.

                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> payload,
                           boolean sentByUser)
        Executes a command given by a user or other system module.
        Specified by:
        executeCommand in class Module
        Parameters:
        command - The name of the command to be executed.
        payload - The arguments for the command.
        sentByUser - Whether the command was called by a user or not. False if called by other system modules such as SHC.
